code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic rst,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (rst) begin
        q <= 1'b0;
    end else begin
        q <= d;
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

end

endmodule
